markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Laughing Gnoll](/Feats.aspx?ID=2802) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

A gnoll's sinister giggle is a sound of warning and threat. You gain the [Battle Cry](/Feats.aspx?ID=759) skill feat. You don't take a penalty when you attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a creature that doesn't understand your language.
name: Laughing Gnoll
